author: Staff Reporter
text:
Said to be having a mental illness, he threw a stone at the front windshield of an MTC bus

The front windshield of a Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTC) bus was damaged after a person with mental illness reportedly threw a stone at it on Monday evening.

Police said that the Metropolitan Transport Corporation bus on Route number 21(Mandaveli to Broadway) was at the Luz Corner signal when the man suddenly threw the stone. No one was injured in the accident. Immediately, a few commuters and passersby nabbed the man and beat him up severely.

He had to be rescued by the police. He was taken to a hospital and later, sent to the government home for those with mental illnesses, in Santhome. No case has been filed by the Mylapore police.
title: Mentally ill man attacks bus
